sn12.40:1.2: “Yanca, bhikkhave, ceteti yanca pakappeti yanca anuseti arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.40:1.4: Tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe nati hoti.
sn12.40:1.7: Cutupapate sati ayatim jati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti.
sn12.40:2.1: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti atha ce anuseti, arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.40:2.3: Tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe nati hoti.
sn12.40:2.6: Cutupapate sati ayatim jati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti.
sn12.40:3.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti, arammanametam na hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.40:3.2: Arammane asati patittha vinnanassa na hoti.
sn12.40:3.3: Tadappatitthite vinnane avirulhe nati na hoti.
sn12.40:3.6: Cutupapate asati ayatim jati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti.
